Package gov.nih.nlm.bioscores.agreement

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Agreement
    The interface for defining and implementing agreement constraints between a coreferential mention and a candidate referent.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcronymAgreement
    Approximation of one of the precise constructs in Stanford DCoref sieve #4.
    AdjacencyAgreement
    The implementation of adjacency constraint.
    AnimacyAgreement
    Implementation of agreement constraint based on animacy.
    ClosestRCMODAgreement
    The agreement based on relative clause dependency relation between the coreferential mention and the candidate referent.
    DiscourseConnectiveAgreement
    A limited implementation of agreement based on sentence-initial discourse connectives that indicate referents in the same sentence.
    DocumentTopicAgreement
    Agreement implementation that mainly applies to indefinite NPs.
    ExactStringAgreement
    Agreement based on exact string match of the mention and the referent.
    GenderAgreement
    Implementation of gender agreement.
    HeadWordAgreement
    Implementation of head word agreement constraint between the coreferential mention and the candidate referent.
    HypernymListAgreement
    Implementation of agreement based on pre-defined hypernym lists for semantic groups.
    NonPostModifierMatchAgreement
    Implementation of Stanford DCoref sieve #3.
    NumberAgreement
    Implementation of number agreement.
    OntologyAgreement
    Implementation of the agreement constraint based on mapping to the same ontological concept.
    PersonAgreement
    Implementation of agreement constraint based on grammatical person.
    PredicateAgreement
    Implementation of agreement based on predicates.
    PredicateNominativeAgreement
    Agreement constraint based on copular constructions.
    ProperHeadWordAgreement
    Approximation of one of the precise constructs in used in Stanford DCoref sieve #8.
    RelativePronDependencyAgreement
    Agreement constraint for relative pronoun anaphora based on dependency relations.
    RelaxedHeadMatchAgreement
    Implementation of one of the precise constructs in Stanford DCoref sieve #9.
    RelaxedStemAgreement
    An agreement constraint based on mention stems.
    SemanticCoercionAgreement
    Agreement constraint that is based on the notion of semantic coercion, described in Castano and Pustejovsky (2002).
    SemanticGroupAgreement
    Agreement constraint based on semantic group equality.
    SemanticTypeAgreement
    Agreement constraint based on semantic type equality.
    StrictHeadMatchAgreement
    Approximation of one of the precise constructs in Stanford DCoref sieve #5.
    SyntacticAppositiveAgreement
    Agreement constraint based on appositive constructions.
    TaxonomyAgreement
    Agreement constraint based on taxonomic relations in ontology.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnimacyAgreement.Animacy  
    GenderAgreement.Gender  
    NumberAgreement.Number  
    PersonAgreement.Person
